author: dario-piotrowicz
message: docs(animations): fix wrong code links present in the animations guide (#43787) fix the links present in the animations guide under td elements written as `[text](link)()` which are not rendered properly Note: - the bug was introduced in PR #42885 - the bug is only present for code blocks inside html block elements, the aforementioned format can be used in the inline html elements without issues PR Close #43787

files.patch: @@ -263,7 +263,7 @@ What it does -[state](api/animations/state)() +state() Creates a named set of CSS styles that should be applied on successful transition to a given state. The state can then be referenced by name within other animation functions. @@ -283,7 +283,7 @@ What it does -[group](api/animations/group)() +group() Specifies a group of animation steps (inner animations) to be run in parallel. Animation continues only after all inner animation steps have completed. Used within sequence() or transition().
